Class PopupBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.morzeux.bioseclogger.logic.PopupBuilder

  • public class PopupBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Popup builder creates basic popups used in application.
    Author:
    Stefan Smihla
